content:
{"name": "Center in the Park", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Enjoy a delicious, nutritious meal with friends Monday through Friday from 11:00 AM to 12:30 PM.
Reservations are required and should be made by Tuesday at 12:30 PM for the following week. For those 60+, lunch is free with a suggested donation of $1.00.
If you’re under 60, the cost is $3.25. Come for the meal, stay for the conversation! To cancel or make a reservation, call 215-848-7722 ext. 208.
", "email": "", "url": "https://centerintheparkphila.org/breakfast-lunch/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5818 Germantown Ave.", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19144", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.03713671807182, "longitude": -75.17631860480688}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 848-7722", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
